document_data.name: Stellok Kolraavi
document_data.mainbody: '''Stellok Kolraavi''' was the dreadful great chief of the [[Black Lion tribe]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. As a leader he did not believe in acting diplomatically and had no ties with nearby "civilized" cultures.
document_data.Relationships: Stellok's younger sister, [[Tysis Kolraavi|Tysis]] served as the [[shaman]] of the Black Lion tribe. She was the only advisor he could truly rely upon.
document_data.Possessions: Great Chief Stellok wore [[hide armor]] made from the skin of an [[orc]].
